item.title: LessPass: A Primer
item.description: LessPass The manager-less password manager LessPass, unlike other password managers does not store any information in a database or local cache. It simply takes in three pieces of information and then hashes that to return a password. If all three pieces of information haven’t changed LessPass will always return the same password. Why use it over other choices Straight from the creator himself: How do I synchronize this file on all my devices?
